form.name: form1

span.div: Due to the ongoing coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic, Clearview Local Schools will be closed from Monday, March 16th, 2020-Friday, May 1st, 2020. Tentatively, school will resume on Monday May 4th, 2020. Click HERE for updates and for the food distribution schedule.

span.style: margin-left: 114px; font-size: 24px; font-family: Raleway; font-weight: 100; color: white;

div.script: $('.homepageSlideshow').slick({ label: 'pager', centerMode: true, dots: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, arrows: true, variableWidth: true, prevArrow: $('.slick-prev'), nextArrow: $('.slick-next'), autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 5000 });

tr.td: Please see the attached public notice.

td.span: Attention Parents! New for the 2019-2020 school year, Clearview is moving to an electronic system for all important enrollment forms (such as Emergency Medical Forms, new student Registration, Physical Forms, etc.) through Final Forms. Click
to access the Final Forms website and start the process. Click

Durling Middle School is proud to announce that we will partnering with Second Harvest Food Bank to host a Mobile Food Pantry for the Clearview Community. Families in need will be able to pick up fresh fruits and vegetables as well as shelf stable pantry items. The Mobile Food Pantry will begin at 3:00pm at Durling Middle School and food will be available until approximately 4:30pm for pick up.

Beginning in October the Pantry will be the 2nd Thursday of each month. Please help us spread the word to families in need of assistance. Call Durling Middle School at 440-233-6869 with Questions. Thank you to everyone who helped make this possible.

td.div: Ms. Janis, our College Now representative is still running the IMPACT program!! Please click HERE for the flyer to get more info and to register for the program.

td.div: Also, Ms. Janis is working hard to connect with students and to assist in any way possible. Please click HERE for the Newsletter to see how to stay in touch with her!
